definition: artificial and inferior, a person or thing that takes or can take the place of another, put in the place of another
details:
adjective
- artificial and inferior
= synonyms: ersatz
- serving or used in place of another
= synonyms: alternative
- capable of substituting in any of several positions on a team
= synonyms: utility
noun
- a person or thing that takes or can take the place of another
= synonyms: replacement
- someone who takes the place of another (as when things get dangerous or difficult)
= synonyms: reliever
- an athlete who plays only when a starter on the team is replaced
= synonyms: reserve, second-stringer
verb
- put in the place of another
= synonyms: interchange
- be a substitute
= example: be a substitute
= synonyms: sub, fill in, stand in
- act as a substitute
= synonyms: deputize, deputise, step in
